description: front facade of cathedral; tower on right taller, with a squared-off top, than tower on left; people walking in front of church
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Stamp

L LRC, in the print: [ROUEN. 88 / A. LEPERE. Del SE
provenance: Claude Roger-Marx, Lugt 2229 (1859-1913), Paris. [Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2011; sold for RAOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2011-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: La Cathédrale de Rouen
